data.text: Champions Surrey start the season home to Essex 🏆.
The season will start on the 5th of April earlier that last year 🥶
Only one side will be relegated from division one, three will be promoted!
The IPL is just around the corner. Last years winners were the Chennai Super Kings
India beat Australia in the 2nd ODI, with stand out perfomances from Shaun Marsh (131), Virat Kohli (104) and MS Dhoni (55*)!
